replies.ask_name: May I have your name, please?
replies.hotel_ask_hotel: What hotel would you like to stay at?
replies.hotel_ask_date_to: When will you be leaving again?
replies.hotel_ask_customer_request: Do you have any special requests that you want to let the hotel know about?
replies.hotel_unavailable: I'm very sorry, but there is no room available at the {hotel_name:s} for your requested dates.
replies.hotel_ask_confirm_booking: Alright, the {hotel_name:s} ticks all of your boxes, can I book this room for you?
replies.hotel_reservation_succeeded: OK, I've successfully completed this booking for you!
replies.hotel_reservation_failed: I'm sorry, but your booking request failed.
replies.hotel_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no hotels that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you reserve a hotel room.
